verses.verse: And after<WG3326> these<WG5023> things I saw<WG1492> four<WG5064> angels<WG32> standing<WG2476> on<WG1909> the four<WG5064> corners<WG1137> of the earth,<WG1093> holding<WG2902> the four<WG5064> winds<WG417> of the earth,<WG1093> that the wind<WG417> should not blow<WG4154> on<WG1909> the earth,<WG1093> nor<WG3383> on<WG1909> the sea,<WG2281> nor<WG3383> on<WG1909> any<WG3956> tree.<WG1186>

And I saw<WG1492> another<WG243> angel<WG32> ascending<WG305> from the east,<WG395> having<WG2192> the seal<WG4973> of the living<WG2198> God:<WG2316> and he cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456> to the four<WG5064> angels,<WG32> to whom<WG3739> it was given<WG1325> to hurt<WG91> the earth<WG1093> and the sea,<WG2281>

Saying,<WG3004> Hurt<WG91> not the earth,<WG1093> neither<WG3383> the sea,<WG2281> nor<WG3383> the trees,<WG1186> till<WG891> we have sealed<WG4972> the servants<WG1401> of our God<WG2316> in their foreheads.<WG3359>

And I heard<WG191> the number<WG706> of them which were sealed:<WG4972> and there were sealed<WG4972> an hundred<WG1540> and forty<WG5062> and four<WG5064> thousand<WG5505> of all<WG3956> the tribes<WG5443> of the children<WG5207> of Israel.<WG2474>

Of the tribe<WG5443> of Juda<WG2455> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of the tribe<WG5443> of Reuben<WG4502> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of the tribe<WG5443> of Gad<WG1045> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505>

Of the tribe<WG5443> of Aser<WG768> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of the tribe<WG5443> of Nephthalim<WG3508> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of the tribe<WG5443> of Manasses<WG3128> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505>

Of the tribe<WG5443> of Simeon<WG4826> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of the tribe<WG5443> of Levi<WG3017> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of the tribe<WG5443> of Issachar<WG2466> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505>

Of the tribe<WG5443> of Zabulon<WG2194> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of the tribe<WG5443> of Joseph<WG2501> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505> Of the tribe<WG5443> of Benjamin<WG958> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand.<WG5505>

After<WG3326> this<WG5023> I beheld,<WG1492> and, see,<WG2400> a great<WG4183> multitude,<WG3793> which<WG3739> no<WG3762> man<WG3762> could<WG1410> number,<WG705> of all<WG3956> nations,<WG1484> and kindreds,<WG5443> and people,<WG2992> and tongues,<WG1100> stood<WG2476> before<WG1799> the throne,<WG2362> and before<WG1799> the Lamb,<WG721> clothed<WG4016> with white<WG3022> robes,<WG4749> and palms<WG5404> in their hands;<WG5495>
And cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> saying,<WG3004> Salvation<WG4991> to our God<WG2316> which<WG3588> sits<WG2521> on the throne,<WG2362> and to the Lamb.<WG721>

And all<WG3956> the angels<WG32> stood<WG2476> round<WG2943> about<WG2943> the throne,<WG2362> and about the elders<WG4245> and the four<WG5064> beasts,<WG2226> and fell<WG4098> before<WG1799> the throne<WG2362> on<WG1909> their faces,<WG4383> and worshipped<WG4352> God,<WG2316>

Saying,<WG3004> Amen:<WG281> Blessing,<WG2129> and glory,<WG1391> and wisdom,<WG4678> and thanksgiving,<WG2169> and honor,<WG5092> and power,<WG1411> and might,<WG2479> be to our God<WG2316> for ever<WG165> and ever.<WG165> Amen.<WG281>

And one<WG1520> of the elders<WG4245> answered,<WG611> saying<WG3004> to me, What<WG5101> are these<WG3778> which<WG3588> are arrayed<WG4016> in white<WG3022> robes?<WG4749> and from where<WG4159> came<WG2064> they?

And I said<WG2046> to him, Sir,<WG2962> you know.<WG1492> And he said<WG2036> to me, These<WG3778> are they which came<WG2064> out of great<WG3173> tribulation,<WG2347> and have washed<WG4150> their robes,<WG4749> and made<WG3021> them white<WG3021> in the blood<WG129> of the Lamb.<WG721>

Therefore<WG1223> <WG5124> are they before<WG1799> the throne<WG2362> of God,<WG2316> and serve<WG3000> him day<WG2250> and night<WG3571> in his temple:<WG3485> and he that sits<WG2521> on<WG1909> the throne<WG2362> shall dwell<WG4637> among<WG1909> them.

They shall hunger<WG3983> no<WG3756> more,<WG2089> neither<WG3761> thirst<WG1372> any<WG2089> more;<WG2089> neither<WG3761> shall the sun<WG2246> light<WG4098> on<WG1909> them, nor<WG3761> any<WG3956> heat.<WG2738>

For the Lamb<WG721> which<WG3588> is in the middle<WG3319> of the throne<WG2362> shall feed<WG4165> them, and shall lead<WG3594> them to living<WG2198> fountains<WG4077> of waters:<WG5204> and God<WG2316> shall wipe<WG1813> away<WG1813> all<WG3956> tears<WG1144> from their eyes.<WG3788>
